rooms.name: Cabin
rooms.description: You are in your cabin. It is quiet, only a red emergency light is blinking. The air is heavy.

rooms.name: Corridor
rooms.description: The central junction of the station. There are smoke smears on the walls.

rooms.name: Storage
rooms.description: A room full of scattered crates and spare parts.

items.name: Flashlight
items.description: A high-powered LED flashlight. Necessary for dark areas.

rooms.name: Canteen
rooms.description: Overturned tables and spilled food. A damaged robot is sitting in the corner.

npc.name: Unit-04
npc.dialogueInitial: Bzzzt... Critical power failure detected... I need a replacement power source...
npc.dialogueSuccess: Power restored. Thank you, engineer. My protocol requires me to give you the Core code: 5-9-1.

rooms.name: Infirmary
rooms.description: A sterile white room. The medicine cabinets have been looted.

items.name: Battery
items.description: A universal power cell. It looks charged.

rooms.name: Laboratory
rooms.description: A room full of computers and microscopes. Something is lying on the table.

items.name: Card
items.description: Service access card Level 5. Allows access to the core.

rooms.name: Technical Corridor
rooms.description: A narrow service tunnel. Without a flashlight it would be absolute darkness. At the end you see massive doors.

rooms.name: AI Core
rooms.description: The heart of Epsilon Station. In the center of the room the main terminal hums.

items.name: terminal
items.description: The station's main control console. Requires a service card and a code.
